nodes.text: Join was a propaganda poster created by Coba Dunivee in collaboration with the Commission for the Preservation of the New Order. It depicted a stormtrooper looking onward as two TIE fighters fly by the stormtrooper across a starry sky, as well as the words "Join the Imperial Army" with the "O" being stylized to resemble the Imperial crest. Sabine Wren, a rebel artist, used Join as the basis for an anti-Imperial propaganda poster of her own, which featured graffiti and rebel symbols defacing Dunivee's poster.
